name: Gunship Air Clash
description:
Keep your aim to make your nation terrorist free kill them and destroy their air heli pads. This is the extreme fighter helicopter air war game where you can seize the turbo boost on the sea port. Its alert, destroy all the base camps of your trrerist and kill them with your fighter plane. The position of enemy forces is very strong and has various weapons in camp. Now you are hired as a special comando agent to complete this mission, Be bravo and destroy all the terririst camps. Hurry up do sergical strike.

Features :
-Mountainous hilly and City environment to take of helicopter.
-3D Stunning graphics
-Missions to be completed in rush time, be exited.
-Challenging game play to find enemy camp and destroy it.
-Realistic sound effects.
-Next gen hi-tech Army helicopter.
-Various addictive levels to complete.
-Physics based helicopter flying simulation.
